summary: Summons Dragons For 1 day.Master for 3 days....don\'t worry they don\'t bite you.....
descriptionHtml:
WARNING: SINCE PATCH 1.5 THIS MOD DOESN\'T WORK...THE SPELLS WON\'T FIRE....I AM TRYING VERY HARD TO FIX THE PROBLEM...BUT IT DOESN\'T WANT TO WORK...WHEN I SUCCEED I WILL UPLOAD FIXED VERSIONS


Summons Dragons for 1 day. Master for 3 days
PLS READ THE DESCRIPTION!!!!!!!   !
                                               !
                                               !
                                               V
Available Dragons: 
-Alduin
-Paarthurnax
-Sahloknir
-Vulthuryol(Blackreach Dragon)

More Dragons still to come( i can\'t get the Skeletal dragon Textures to work properly....when i fix them it will be uploaded right away)


You can find the Spell tomes in Dragonsreach. look for Farengar Secret-Fire(the court wizard) he can sell the spells to you
The Spells have no Magicka cost so you can summon them whenever you like, but you can have 1 Dragon at a time....as soon as you summon one the other will dissapear.... :/


And now you can have MASTER spells.....i have uploaded that one......and kept the old ones.....they are NOT OLD mods....the 1 handed spells are still good...so you can combine them with some other spells or weapons.......




Becouse some of you reported my mod does not work........here is what you will need
-the 1.4 patch for skyrim......i made these mods in this patch....
-optional:The CreationKit.....maybe the esp-s are somehow connected to it.....and with this you can modify my mod to make your own possibly better version   ...... just give me credit and it will be ok...... :D


how to buy the spell tomes :
-this is a stupid topic...right?...NOOO!!!!! IT\'S NOT!!!!
the buying of the spell tomes isn\'t simple...
(load the esp-s 1 by 1) .....first load alduin and then buy the tome ingame and ,,read\'\' it......then do the same for paarthurnax but keep alduin on......and for the other dragons it\'s the same thing....but do not turn off the other esp-s the spells will disapear form your inventory....i am now doing 1 esp for all the tomes......i will upload it when i finish and test it

This Mod Will Have Updates.........Comment me if you have any requests   :D
author: daxetron
